definition: Himalayas
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
elegant
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Himalayas
pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

sentences.english: Will the Himalaya Mountains, home to the world's highest peaks, continue to push up into the sky in future?
sentences.chinese: 拥有世界最高峰的喜马拉雅山还将继续“长高”吗？

sentences.english: The result suggests that the Himalayas and the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau will not continue to move up indefinitely.
sentences.chinese: 测量结果表明，喜马拉雅山和青藏高原不会无限升高。

sentences.english: When I saw Yeti on Himalayas, I was so surprised I stopped dead .
sentences.chinese: 我在喜马拉雅山遇到雪人时，我吃惊得呆住了。

sentences.english: High in the Himalayan mountains of Asia, thekingdom of Bhutan remained separate.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲巍峨的喜马拉雅山，不丹王国仍然是独立的。

sentences.english: Ki is a tiny village in the middle of the Himalayas, and next to it is Ki Gompa (Ki Monastery).
sentences.chinese: 启是喜马拉雅山中的一个小村庄，启藏庙就依村而建。

sentences.english: Sino Indian eastern boder should be on the southern foot of Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 中印东段边界的传统习惯线在喜马拉雅山南麓。

sentences.english: An Indian believer went on a pilgrimage to the saint temple in Himalaya mountains.
sentences.chinese: 一位印度教徒，步行前往喜马拉雅山的圣庙去朝圣。

sentences.english: Trophic niche of flea in the southern slope of the Himalaya Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 喜马拉雅山南坡蚤类营养生态位的研究。

sentences.english: Shifts in the Earth's crust pushed India into Asia, heaving up the Himalaya.
sentences.chinese: 地壳运动将印度推向亚洲，托起喜马拉雅山。

sentences.english: Mt. Everest lies in the Himalaya mountains in the country of Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰位于尼泊尔境内的喜马拉雅山中。

sentences.english: Nestled in the Himalayas, bordering the world's highest peak, Mount Everest, lies tiny landlocked Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰雄踞世界屋脊喜马拉雅山颠。

definition: Himalayas
pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: the roof of the world/usually refers to Tibet or Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau 青藏高原[Qing1 Zang4 gao1 yuan2]
Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
Qinghai-Tibetan plateau
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
Mt Gangdisê (6656m) in southwest Tibet, revered by Tibetans as the center of the universe
Gangdisê mountain range in southwest Tibet
Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
Andes mountain chain of South America
Kunlun Mountain range
Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
pinyin: Ka1 la3 kun1 lun2 Shan1 mai4

definition: abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
